artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Yamana Tomesaburō; Author: Masukawa Kan'yū; Publisher: Fukyūsha; Carver: Tsuchiyama

description: light blue cover; one color image at beginning of three male figures in loin cloths standing on a shoreline under palm trees pointing at a large ship in the bay; pages of text with black and white images
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Color Prints of Stories for Moral Education (Nishiki-e shūshindan 錦絵修身談)
title: Color Prints of Stories for Moral Education, vol. 5
